title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.1 - Surtax imposed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.1 - Surtax imposed

State Regulations

Pursuant to the authority of section 131 of chapter 439
of the Laws of 1974, and local law INT 544 of the New York City Council, a five
percent surcharge on the portion of pari-mutuel wagering pools distributable to
persons having placed bets at off-track betting facilities has been imposed
upon all off-track pari-mutuel wagering in the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4409.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
